sentences.sentence: This limitation in time is most clearly seen whether it be an estate held for the life of the tenant, or what is called an estate pur autre vie.
sentences.translation: 无论是在租户的整个生命周期内持有的房地产，还是所谓的房地产竞争，时间限制是最清晰可见的。
处理器使用率资源——PUR寄存器。

sentences.sentence: This is pur first lesson, so I don't know all your names.
sentences.translation: 这是我们的第一堂课，因此我不知道你们的名字。
